rows.label: tlk70000071_05_msg0001
rows.name:
Are you going to stop the Grail? Sorry,
I'm not asking you to do it... I just get
so frustrated at my own powerlessness.

rows.label: tlk70000071_05_msg0002
rows.name:
But you're not like me... You may be
Blades and Drivers, but you're better
adventurers than any I've ever met.

rows.label: tlk70000071_05_msg0003
rows.name:
You have such strength, and you're so
pure in your pursuit... To tell you the
truth, I'm a little jealous.

rows.label: tlk70000071_05_msg0004
rows.name:
Just ignore me, I'm being foolish...
Anyhow, I think I'm going to help out
with orientation for the refugees!
